phrases: There is nothing to worry about with him.
Are you back to normal, Carla?
Everyone is waiting, so I will be going.
You do not intend to say anything?
What good would telling her about that future do?
There is no way she would believe me.
The Grand Magic Games are held once a year.
Natsu and company participated in the elimination round,
and just barely placed eighth, qualifying them for the actual Games.
Between the competition part on the first day, Hidden, and the battle part,
Natsu and his compatriots were shut out, gaining zero points.
That makes it fun, do not ya think?
We are going to turn it around from this point on.
In the competition of the second day, Chariot,
Natsu, representing Fairy Tail, finally got two points.
Super Paralysis Claw Mega Mega Jellyfish!
It is not my real name...
It is not your real name?!
If I win, you are tellin' me your real name!
That is fine, but what if I win?
I will tell you a secret about myself!
Apparently, they have made a weird bet.
I am not interested in learning either one, though...
I like the sound of that...
And he is not getting back up!
The winner is Blacksnake of Raven Tail!
And I do not think he was really trying hard.
Even without the dirty tricks, they have got strong people on their team.
This brings Raven Tail up to 36 points.
I cannot find one of them...
Even though I have been searching for it for the past three months,
I cannot find it for some reason...
I could not bring myself to tell anyone...
It was right here all this time?!
Unbelievably, I am a little touched by this!
The two congratulate each other on a good fight and shake hands...
It is my nature to want to destroy something precious.
You will not get away with this!
There is a man with a sick sense of humor!
That is the true nature of Raven Tail.
I do not even know what Ivan's thinkin'...
I bet he was just being malicious, plain and simple!
Okay, let us get back on track with today's second match!
Versus an opponent from Fairy Tail A...
What do we do if they announce Natsu?!
He is on the same level as you, right, Erza?
I do not care who does it, but somebody avenge me!
If it is Gray-sama, he will win with ease.
You did set it up as I asked?
This is definitely going to be one great match!
That is a terrible thing to say!
The only thing we can do now is win!
I wanted to see Bacchus versus Erza!
This will not be any kind of fight!
But if his opponent is Bacchus...
Hey, how about you and me make a bet like those last guys did?
Both of your sisters are delightful dishes...
What do you want to say?
If I win, they are mine.
Both of them, at the same time...
That is a warped form of love!
There are some things a Man cannot let pass...
I am going to tear you apart!
A stranger's scent lingering in the room...
No, this is the one that was sleeping!
Where the hell are you takin'
Are not that the one who staggered to the finish line in the last competition?!
This is the best way to deal with wizards!
Give me back Wendy and the others!
And he will catch up to us at this rate!
The order was to get the girl in the infirmary!
An old bag and some cat are not girls!
Then why did we bring them?!
Wait, when you look at this old woman from a certain angle...
This is unquestionably a one-sided match!
I can see how he would fight you to a draw, Erza.
No, what is really hard to deal with is coming up.
He is a man who gets down to business when he needs to, right?
Elfman's attacks are not landing at all!
Maybe it is because of that guy's weird movements...
It is a type where magic converges in the palms of his hands.
But the secret of his strength
is mastery of a martial art that allows him to maximize that magic.
The style of martial art is called Cleaving Hook Palm
and that characteristic stance is used to deliver skillful palm strikes.
is when he improved on that martial art,
It is impossible to predict the attacks of a drunken hawk.
On top of that, his destructive force has been beefed up, making him a shoo-in to win.
Even so, that is not the problem.
He has not had even one drop of booze yet.
That is an unusual style of martial art.
Actually, I have never seen it myself.
The move we saw at the tavern incident.
Is not there anything he can do?
He will figure out a way.
He is more than just a big lug.
We have got to believe in him!
The movements of drunken Bacchus are as powerful as they are unpredictable.
But he has not had anything to drink yet, right?
He is not trying hard at all.
Elfman's Take Over has come undone!
Not only has he consumed a lot of magic power,
but it also goes to show how powerful that attack was.
You are a man, are not you?
You will keep your promise, right?
Today, the Grand Magic Games official mascot-slash-judge,
so I am filling in as the judge, too.
All he needs to take a break is change his innards.
I guess all that repetition of the word man was not for nothing.
Come to think of it, I did not decide yet, hound dog.
Well, there is no chance of that,
so go ahead, whatever you want.
If I win, the name of your guild
is Quatro Puppy for the duration of the Games.
I think I will wind this up.
Bacchus has hit the bottle at last!
This is the first time I have seen it before my very eyes!
You should easily be able to beat a drunk like me.
That is Drunken Cleaving Hook Palm!
I-I do not know what happened because I could not see it!
Seven blows in that one instant!
That just did a lot of damage, did not it?
If I cannot hit you, then you can hit me!
I did not know about that...
Do not tell me this is his...
I think the other guy's in big trouble.
What does he mean to do?
Do not take your eyes off of them.
Watch his battle to the end.
This is a fight to see which will break!
True, Lizardman's skin and scales are covered with innumerable spines,
so it goes well against a bare-handed opponent,
but this particular opponent can shatter Lizardman's tough scales.
More of a clash of wills than a battle!
Bacchus is the one who got back up!
This gives them a total of 12 points!
Does this battle roar portend Fairy Tail's comeback?!
Elfman pulls off a spectacular victory over a formidable enemy!
I told you not to call me that!
We were told to get the girl who was in the infirmary.
We will take care of them.
The girl... who was in the infirmary...
In the first place, you had the wrong target.
Did not I tell you what she looked like?
It just means we will move to plan B.
We arrested them and hauled them off to prison.
They believe their client is Raven Tail.
We need to keep using the discord between Fairy Tail and Raven Tail like this.
And while they are busy feuding, we will grab a Celestial Spirit Wizard...
All they have been doing is playing dirty tricks...
but this are not over by a long shot!
I hear next time is a pin-up model showdown between Mira and Jenny!
And you can barge in on it?!
A-Although I am not the least bit interested in girls' swimsuits!
Oh, Charlotte's wearing a swimsuit, too!
She goes along with stuff more than I thought...
Mira's the one who is fighting.
